Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Root/Normal
ShortDescription: Eastbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Emerald, Root, Wallace and 43rd : due to, street blockage near Root/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Emerald, Root, Wallace and 43rd : due to, street blockage near Root/Normal.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
